Package ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading

Class BuyOffer

java.lang.Object
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading.Offer
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading.BuyOffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BuyOffer
extends Offer
Class for creating a buy offer and resolving the buy offer after it has been created
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading.Offer

    FULLY_RESOLVED, NO_MATCHING_OFFERS, NOT_RESOLVED, PARTIALLY_RESOLVED

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    BuyOffer​(int orderID, java.lang.String asset, int quantity, double pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
    Overloaded Constructor for trade offer - used when retrieving offer from DB which includes the orderID

    Constructor for trade offer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int resolveOffer()
    Compares the created buy offer with all sell offers, finding offers with the same asset name and appropriate price Then proceeds to trade assets and credits, whilst updating the offer quantities or removing them (if fully resolved) Repeats this process until the buy offer has been fully resolved OR there are no more matching sell offers

    Methods inherited from class ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading.Offer

    getAssetName, getOfferID, getPricePerUnit, getQuantity, getUnitName, getUsername, isMatching, orgOwnsAsset, sameAssetName, setOfferID, setQuantity, toString

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • BuyOffer

      public BuyOffer​(java.lang.String asset, int quantity, double pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
      Constructor for trade offer
      Parameters:
      asset - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The ID of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The ID of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected

    • BuyOffer

      public BuyOffer​(int orderID, java.lang.String asset, int quantity, double pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
      Overloaded Constructor for trade offer - used when retrieving offer from DB which includes the orderID
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the offer
      asset - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The ID of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The ID of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected

  • Method Details

    • resolveOffer

      public int resolveOffer()
      Compares the created buy offer with all sell offers, finding offers with the same asset name and appropriate price Then proceeds to trade assets and credits, whilst updating the offer quantities or removing them (if fully resolved) Repeats this process until the buy offer has been fully resolved OR there are no more matching sell offers
      Specified by:
      resolveOffer in class Offer
      Returns:
      NOT_RESOLVED if no trades occured, PARTIALLY resolved if part of the offer was resolved, and FULLY_RESOLVED if the buy offer is fully resolved
